title: Occultist
name: Alhazred
summary: A powerful occultist who has delved deep into forbidden knowledge and eldritch powers. Alhazred has performed rituals that have left him forever changed, serving as a conduit to unknown regions and constantly assailed by blasphemous forces. His pursuit of arcane wisdom and impossible power has come at a great cost, both to himself and those around him.
history: Alhazred conducted rituals to explore the Outer Sphere, found a mysterious pyramid in a desert that changed everything, sacrificed parts of himself for power, and ultimately became a beacon for eldritch entities. His apotheosis was achieved through dangerous rituals and communion with forces beyond mortal comprehension.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

notes: Constantly hears whispers from eldritch entities
Has sacrificed parts of himself for power
